item.title: forge
item.description: A task runner and build tool with a simple declarative config and parallel execution.

item.title: pxl
item.description: A software renderer built from scratch in C++ supporting rasterization and basic shading.

item.title: netwatch
item.description: A lightweight CLI network monitor that tracks latency, packet loss, and bandwidth in real time.

item.title: litelang
item.description: A dynamically typed scripting language with a tree-walk interpreter, written in C.

item.title: kv
item.description: A persistent key-value store built in Go using a log-structured merge-tree.

item.title: rustshell
item.description: A minimal POSIX shell written in Rust with piping, redirection, and job control.

item.title: Code, Mermaid & Diagrams
item.description:
Syntax Highlighting

Go

go /// 
package main

import "fmt"

func fibonacci(n int) int {
	if n <= 1 {
		return n
	}
	return fibonacci(n-1) + fibonacci(n-2)
}

func main() {
	for i := range 10 {
		fmt.Printf("F(%d) = %d\n", i, fibonacci(i))
	}
}

Python

python /// 
def quicksort(arr: list) -> list:
 if len(arr) <= 1:
 return arr
 pivot = arr[len(arr) // 2]
 left = [x for x in arr if x < pivot]
 mid = [x for x in arr if x == pivot]
 right = [x for x in arr if x > pivot]
 return quicksort(left) + mid + quicksort(right)

print(quicksort([3, 6, 8, 10, 1, 2, 1]))

Shell

bash /// 
#!/usr/bin/env bash
set -euo pipefail

for dir in */; do
 echo "Processing: $dir"
 hugo build --source "$dir" --destination "dist/${dir%/}"
done

Mermaid Diagrams

Flowchart

flowchart TD A([Start]) --> B[Read config] B --> C{Valid?} C -- Yes --> D[Build site] C -- No --> E[Show error] D --> F([Done]) E --> F

Sequence Diagram

sequenceDiagram participant Browser participant Hugo participant CDN Browser->>Hugo: GET /page Hugo->>Hugo: Render template Hugo-->>Browser: HTML response Browser->>CDN: GET /styles.css CDN-->>Browser: Cached asset

Entity Relationship

erDiagram AUTHOR ||--o{ POST : writes POST ||--|{ TAG : has POST { string title date publishedAt bool draft }

GoAT ASCII Diagrams

goat /// 
 ┌───────────┐
 │ Client │
 └─────┬─────┘
 │ HTTP
 ┌─────────▼──────────┐
 │ Load Balancer │
 └──┬──────────────┬──┘
 │ │
 ┌───────▼───┐ ┌─────▼──────┐
 │ Server A │ │ Server B │
 └───────────┘ └────────────┘
goat /// 
 0 1 2 3
 +-------+-------+-------+
 | | | |
 | A | B | C |
 | | | |
 +-------+-------+-------+

Go

package main

		fmt.Printf("F(%d) = %d\n", i, fibonacci(i))
	}

Python

python /// 
def quicksort(arr: list) -> list:
 if len(arr) <= 1:
 return arr
 pivot = arr[len(arr) // 2]
 left = [x for x in arr if x < pivot]
 mid = [x for x in arr if x == pivot]
 right = [x for x in arr if x > pivot]
 return quicksort(left) + mid + quicksort(right)

print(quicksort([3, 6, 8, 10, 1, 2, 1]))

for dir in */; do

done

Flowchart

flowchart TD A([Start]) --> B[Read config] B --> C{Valid?} C -- Yes --> D[Build site] C -- No --> E[Show error] D --> F([Done]) E --> F

sequenceDiagram participant Browser participant Hugo participant CDN Browser->>Hugo: GET /page Hugo->>Hugo: Render template Hugo-->>Browser: HTML response Browser->>CDN: GET /styles.css CDN-->>Browser: Cached asset

Entity Relationship

GoAT ASCII Diagrams

goat /// 
 ┌───────────┐

 └─────┬─────┘
 │ HTTP
 ┌─────────▼──────────┐
 │ Load Balancer │
 └──┬──────────────┬──┘
 │ │
 ┌───────▼───┐ ┌─────▼──────┐
 │ Server A │ │ Server B │
 └───────────┘ └────────────┘

 | | | |
 | A | B | C |

item.title: Math & KaTeX
item.description:
Inline Math

The quadratic formula is $x = \frac{-b \pm \sqrt{b^2 - 4ac}}{2a}$, used to solve any quadratic equation.

Euler’s identity, $e^{i\pi} + 1 = 0$, is considered one of the most beautiful equations in mathematics.

The Pythagorean theorem states that $a^2 + b^2 = c^2$ for any right triangle.

Block Math

The Gaussian integral:

item.title: Math & KaTeX
item.description:
Inline Math

The quadratic formula is $x = \frac{-b \pm \sqrt{b^2 - 4ac}}{2a}$, used to solve any quadratic equation.

Euler’s identity, $e^{i\pi} + 1 = 0$, is considered one of the most beautiful equations in mathematics.

The Pythagorean theorem states that $a^2 + b^2 = c^2$ for any right triangle.
